component.name: Cockatrice
component.summary: A cross-platform virtual tabletop for multiplayer card games

description.p: Cockatrice is an open-source multi-platform supported program for playing tabletop card games over a network. The program's server design prevents any kind of client modifications to gain an unfair advantage in a game. The client also has a built in single-player mode where you can create decks without being connected to a server.
